snippet: Phil Hughes pitched perhaps his best game of the season, and the Yankees erupted with three home runs, including a grand slam by Robinson Cano.
abstract: New York Yankees defeat Kansas City Royals, 10-4; Yankees pitcher Phil Hughes produces perhaps his best game of the season, and the Yankees back him up with three home runs.
lead_paragraph: Phil Hughes pitched perhaps his best game of the season, and the Yankees erupted with three home runs, including a grand slam by Robinson Cano.

headline.seo: Hughes and Yankees’ Offense Find Their Old Form
headline.main: Hughes and Offense Allow Yankees to Exit Kansas City on an Up Note
headline.print_headline: Hughes and Offense Allow Yankees to Exit Kansas City on an Up Note
